english.segment1: Used to be the smiter came. Struck my cheek and I cursed his name. Used to be my fist was drawn. My heart was stone and its mercy gone. I was wrong to breath. Any words but these
english.segment2: Peace and mercy. Invade every soul that hurts me, I pray. Peace and mercy. Invade every soul that hurts me. Love my enemy. Love my enemy. Like you loved me
english.segment3: Used to be I rolled the dice. Held the spear and I broke your side. Water, blood and mercy ran. Turning foes to forgiven friends. I'd be wrong to give. Any less than this
english.segment4: Peace and mercy. Invade every soul that hurts me, I pray. Peace and mercy. Invade every soul that hurts me. Love my enemy. Change my enemy. Forgive my enemy. Love my enemy. Like you loved me
